attributes.action: find a way or fund the development of cheaper, affordable housing for the homeless, un-employed, and young families.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a great lack of housing in the torquay area and the areas where there are houses are not safe enough areas such as hele village for instance, there are growing amounts of young parents and work in the bay is decreasing FAST. I may only be 19 years old however I feel that the government are not making a good enough effort in towns and villages and feel that they are forgetting the south wests increasing unemployment rate. There are not enough jobs, not enough training courses. None offered to young people at my age who will soon be a parent and must support there family. I have done some qualifications I gained while I was serving in the Armed Forces, however these qualifications are not what employers are looking for in the bay. Please Mr Prime Minister, look at torbay and find a way to fund / help with the employement problem for us young parents / parents to be.
